s: December 14, 2021 - WOCA Denmark was created in 2018 on the foundation of Trip Trap Woodcare which roots run as far back as 1969. The basic philosophy and the brand Trip Trap Woodcare and WOCA Denmark consist in the same familiar and uncompromising quality as always.

s: WOCA Denmark was founded in 1969 as part of Trip Trap Denmark A/S. For many years, wooden stairs, flooring and furniture were the essential product range. In 2004 we became an independent, Danish company specializing in wood care that cares for wood surfaces, your indoor climate and the generation to come. Today, we take pride in being a global, recognized Danish brand ...
